attributes.action: Allow those businesses that didn't apply for the full 50K covid loan to top up
attributes.additional_details: Some companies like my own only applied for a fraction of what we could as we didn't expect covid to last this long. We're now told that your only allowed to apply once even if you didn't take the full amount
attributes.background: Allow those companies that were entitled to more of the bounce back loan than they applied for to top up their loan to the maximum that was allowed

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552317
